mapper.select: select eid, create_time, update_time, role_name, service, description from gambling.auth_role
mapper.insert: insert into gambling.auth_role(eid, create_time, update_time, role_name, service, description) values(gambling.seq_eid.nextval, sysdate, sysdate, #{role.roleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{role.service,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{role.description,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update gambling.auth_role set update_time = sysdate, description = #{role.description}, service = #{role.service} where eid = #{role.eid}
mapper.select: select t1.* from gambling.auth_role t1 left join gambling.auth_user_role t2 on t1.role_id = t2.role_id left join gambling.auth_user t3 on t2.user_id = t3.user_id where t3.user_id = #{userId}

select count(1) from gambling.auth_role where 1=1
and role_name like '%'|| #{name} ||'%'
and description like '%'|| #{description} ||'%'
